ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Except the chosen creatures of God,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But Allah's chosen servants (shall be spared this woeful end).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But the sincere servants of God
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Except the chosen bondmen of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Save the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Save the servants of Allah, the purified ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But the chosen servants of God;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But the bondmen of Allah, the sincere ones -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the sincere (and devoted) Servants of Allah,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Save the chosen slaves of Allah (faithful, obedient, true believers of Islamic Monotheism).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But for the sincere worshipers of Allah,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But not the chosen servants of Allah.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:40] Except for God’s sincere servants, namely, the believers (the exception clause here is a discontinuous one),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Save single minded slaves of Allah) who are protected from disbelief and idolatry; it is also said that its meaning is: save those who are chosen for worship and for the profession of Allah's divine Oneness;
